# LinearPCMFormatFlagsAreAllClear

**Enumeration Case**

A value indicating that all PCM format flags are clear.

## Declaration

```swift
LinearPCMFormatFlagsAreAllClear
```

## Discussion

This flag is a synonym of [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioFormatFlags/FormatFlagsAreAllClear].

## Special Purpose Flags

- **FormatFlagsAreAllClear**: A value indicating that all format flags are clear.
